Class ConversionUtils

WEB-INF.cftags.component

public class ConversionUtils

extends WEB-INF.cftags.component

Various methods for transforming xml,json,cf objects

Constructor Summary
init()
 
Method Summary
 any cfToXML(any object, [string root=''], [string forceCase='natural'])
          takes a complex cf object and converts it to an xml document string
 any jsonToCF(string theJSON)
          takes a json string and converts it to an equivalent CF object
 any jsonToXML(string theJSON)
          takes a json string and converts it to a xml object
 struct xmlObjToStructDeep(any theXML)
          takes an xml object and converts to a native cf struct, including attributes
 struct xmlObjToStructSimple(any theXML)
          takes an xml object and converts it to native cf struct; no attributes are handled, only simple node based values
 any xmlToCF(XML thexml)
          Takes an XML object and converts it into an equivalent CF object
 any xmlToJSON()
          Alias for xmlToJSONSimple
 string xmlToJSONDeep(string theXML)
          takes an xml string and converts it to JSON, including xml attributes
 string xmlToJSONSimple(string theXML)
          takes an xml string and converts it to JSON, ignores xml attributes
